00028 void EImport::Initialize(Topology *top, Property *options) {
00029 
00030     string key = "options.eimport";
00031 
00032     _energiesFile = options->get(key + ".energies").as< string >();
00033 }
00034 
00035 bool EImport::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
00036 
00037     string filename = _energiesFile;
00038     std::string line;
00039     std::ifstream intt;
00040     intt.open(filename.c_str());
00041 
00042     if (intt.is_open() ) {
00043     
00044         while ( intt.good() ) {
00045 
00046             std::getline(intt, line);
00047             vector<string> split;
00048             Tokenizer toker(line, " \t");
00049             toker.ToVector(split);
00050 
00051             if ( !split.size()      ||
00052                   split[0] == "!"   ||
00053                   split[0].substr(0,1) == "!" ) { continue; }
00054 
00055 
00056             // Sample line
00057             // 10 Alq3 0 0.00000000  +1 -0.49966334  0 20  +1 10  SPH 2366 ...
00058 
00059             int    id   = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[0]);
00060             string name = boost::lexical_cast<string>(split[1]);
00061 
00062             Segment *seg = top->getSegment(id);
00063 
00064             if (seg->getName() != name) {
00065                 cout << endl << "... ... ERROR: Structure of input file does "
00066                                 "not match state file. "
00067                      << "SEG ID " << id << flush;
00068                 continue;
00069             }
00070 
00071             int    tell = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[6]);
00072             if (tell*tell == 0) {
00073 
00074                 int state_N = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[2]);
00075                 int state_C = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[4]);
00076 
00077                 assert(state_N == 0);
00078                 assert(state_C*state_C == 1);
00079 
00080                 double e_N = boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[3]);
00081                 double e_C = boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[5]);
00082 
00083                 seg->setEMpoles(state_N, e_N);
00084                 seg->setEMpoles(state_C, e_C);
00085             }
00086 
00087             else if (tell*tell == 1) {
00088 
00089                 int state_N = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[2]);
00090                 int state_A = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[4]);
00091                 int state_C = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[6]);
00092 
00093                 assert(state_N == 0);
00094                 assert(state_A == -1);
00095                 assert(state_C == +1);
00096 
00097                 double e_N = boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[3]);
00098                 double e_A = boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[5]);
00099                 double e_C = boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[7]);
00100 
00101                 seg->setEMpoles(state_N, e_N);
00102                 seg->setEMpoles(state_A, e_A);
00103                 seg->setEMpoles(state_C, e_C);
00104             }
00105 
00106             else {
00107                 cout << endl << "... ... ERROR: Wrong input format. "
00108                      << "SEG ID " << id << flush;
00109                 continue;
00110             }
00111         }
00112     }
00113     else { cout << endl << "ERROR: No such file " << filename << endl; }
00114 
00115 }
